principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Fintech precision with Education warmth
Emotion First: Reduce anxiety through clarity and calm colors
Content is King: Data must be legible and hierarchical
Negative Space: Use whitespace to prevent cognitive overload
Contrast: High contrast for data readability

usage_rules: Use 'DM Sans' for all body text, labels, and inputs.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' specifically for Ranks, Percentages, and Cutoff data.
Overlines/Labels must be Uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs.
typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Outfit:wght@400;600;700&display=swap');

spacing.base: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical. Minimum p-6 for cards.

grids.landing: Bento Grid (Mode A): Mix of col-span-full, col-span-4, and col-span-2 cards.
grids.dashboard: Control Room Grid (Mode B): Sidebar (fixed) + Main Content (fluid grid).
grids.results: List View with Sticky Header. Use 'grid-cols-[2fr_1fr_1fr_1fr]' for table rows.

surfaces.cards: Flat background, 1px subtle border (border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800), no shadow by default. Hover: Shadow-lg + Scale 1.01.
surfaces.tracing_beam: Use for the 'Active Predictor' card. Animated gradient border.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-base font-medium shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 bg-transparent border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-100 dark:hover:bg-slate-800

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg bg-slate-50 dark:bg-slate-900 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 transition-all
inputs.labels: text-sm font-medium text-slate-500 dark:text-slate-400 mb-2 block

cards.predictor_card: p-8 rounded-2xl border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 hover:border-indigo-500/50 transition-colors group relative overflow-hidden
cards.result_card: p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800 bg-white dark:bg-slate-900/50 hover:bg-slate-50 dark:hover:bg-slate-800/50 transition-colors

charts.style: Minimalist. Remove grid lines. Use gradients for areas. Tooltips must be custom styled (glassmorphism).

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire app to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use 'Northern Lights' (Indigo to Teal) for hero sections, but keep it subtle (opacity 0.8).
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Use stroke-width={1.5} for a refined look.

motion.entrance: Stagger children by 0.1s. Fade up + Scale 0.95 -> 1.0.

hero_background.description: Modern university architecture with glass and clock, implies timelessness and future.
hero_background.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay (bg-slate-950/90).

success_section.description: Happy graduates taking selfie, implies success and relief.

tech_background.description: Abstract neon lines, implies data flow and prediction algorithms.
tech_background.usage: Background for the 'How it Works' or 'Algorithm' section.

setup: Install dependencies: framer-motion, lucide-react, clsx, tailwind-merge, recharts, sonner, vaul (for drawers).
Configure Tailwind colors to match the 'Deep Indigo' palette.
Add the font imports to index.css immediately.
implementation_order: 2. Build UI Primitives (Button, Input, Card, Badge) with E1 styles.
3. Create Landing Page (Hero, Predictor Grid, Features).
5. Build Results Page (Data Grid, Filters, Charts).
critical_rules: DO NOT use default Shadcn styles. Override radius to 0.75rem (rounded-xl) or 1rem (rounded-2xl).
DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
Ensure Dark Mode is manually toggleable and persists.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry. Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
universal_guidelines.dark_mode: Dark mode should not be pitch black (#000). Use #020617 (Slate 950) for background and #0f172a (Slate 900) for cards.
universal_guidelines.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with a white/5 border for a premium feel. Do not use simple opacity.
universal_guidelines.micro_interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click. Cards should lift on hover. Inputs should have a colored ring on focus.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is > 4.5:1. Use 'text-slate-500' only on 'bg-slate-50' or lighter. On dark backgrounds, use 'text-slate-400'.
